Html:
Hello, I was wondering if someone could help me. 

 

As part of my work I have to cite my work according to the following instructions: http://libraryonline.leedsmet.ac.uk/lco/publications/pdf/subj/is-9.pdf 

 

I looked through all of the styles and none of them are quite right, I was wondering if anyone knew where I could get this style from or how to configure it. I believe that the closest style is the the Leeds.xsl style.

 

Thanks I advance and I apologise if I have not given enough information
